name: Kimberley Travellers Lodge Broome
description:
The Kimberley Travellers Lodge YHA is in Broome's first and finest budget accommodation, with a friendly, relaxed atmosphere in a convenient central location. We welcome solo backpackers, couples, nomads, families, and tour groups! The Kimberley Travellers Lodge is an adventure hub for those wishing to tour the Kimberley and West Coast regions.

Located in the heart of Broome, WA, this family-owned lodge has a range of multi-share and private rooms with air-conditioning, shared bathrooms, a well-equipped communal kitchen, a laundry, an oasis pool with waterfall, sun deck, an in-house bar and chilled-out beer garden, free breakfast, free WIFI, a book exchange, free BBQ, free parking and Happy Hour between 6-7pm 20% off.  

Close to Chinatown and only a 10-minute walk from the Broome International Airport, The Kimberley Travellers Lodge YHA is the perfect accommodation for people that want to be in the hub of Broome. 

Reception is open 8:00am to 10pm daily (March- end of November) but) if we are on a wet season weekend siesta we are never far away, donâ€™t hesitate to send us an email or call (Number is in the confirmation email).

The Kimberley Travellers Lodge has a 48-hour cancellation policy. If a booking is cancelled within 48 hours of arriving, or you fail to show up at all, a one-night cancellation fee will apply. Once paid and checked in, no refunds or transfers are given so please be sure of your plans.

houseRules.notes:
CANCELLATION POLICY

The Kimberley Travellers Lodge has a 48 hour cancellation policy. If a booking is cancelled within 24 hours of arriving, or you fail to show up at all, a one-night cancellation fee will apply.

Once paid and checked in, no refunds or transfers are given so please be sure of your plans.

Reception is open 8am to 8pm daily but call us if we are on a wet season weekend siesta, we are never far away 

Due to the shared nature of the facilities at YHA properties, YHA may require all guests to provide proof of vaccination. A safe stay is our top priority so we have enhanced hygiene measures in place, along with social distancing practices.

Check in:
Check in is open from 2:00pm until 8:00pm. If the front office is unattended for any reason, please call us. As a licensed premises you are also required to present valid photo ID - either passport or drivers license.

Check Out:
You are required to check out before 10:00am. Upon check out those staying in dorm rooms must bring your bed linen to reception. Please note that the mattress protector and pillow can stay on the bed.

Key Deposit: We don't require a key deposit. But upon loosing your key you are charged $10.

Reception: 
Reception be open from 7:00am until 8:00pm.

Kitchen:
The kitchen will be open from 7.00am till 10:00pm. Please note that you are required to do your own clean up and dishes. Store personal groceries in the fridge, in a bag labelled with your name, room number and departure date. Unlabelled foods may be thrown out or donated.

Breakfast:
Self-serve continental breakfast is provided 7.00am to 10.00am.

Pool:
The oasis pool can be used from sunrise till sunset.

Front Gate:
The front gate will be closed at 10:00pm, but you are still able to enter and exit the lodge.

Noise Policy:
We ask people to take other guests into consideration. Please use inside voices after 10:00pm.

Bar:
The bar will be open from 10.00am until 11.00pm daily, though if quiet we may close early. Responsible Service of Alcohol laws will be observed.

Alcohol Policy:
This is a licensed premises and as a result alcohol can only be consumed on site if purchased on site. Consumption is restricted within the beer garden, pool decking area and around the camp fire, as is indicated by signs. There is no alcohol allowed in rooms! Personal alcohol supplies must be handed in to the office on arrival and returned to you on departure.

Smoking Policy:
Smoking is not permitted in the rooms, bar area, laundry, kitchen, balcony or foyer areas. Smoking is only permitted on the pool decking and in the car park.

Linen Policy:
Linen is provided. Please keep any of your own bedding off site. Alternately we can store it for you during your stay.
